name: Tiger Run
description:
Quick, simple game made in unity, this is a school project. this is not a finished game and there is no end level, this is for a school project to use analytic in unity.

Thanks for playing.

Instruction:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

X to jump.

Credits:

Andres Sagastume

Dylan mercadante

Arrison Louzada

Assets

Fox "The Fox" by IDK.

Sunny Land by ANSIMUZ.

Africa by toto.

“Africa by toto” 8-bit by 8-bit universe.
